ğŸ‘‰ PreudoCode

  2. ëœë¤í•˜ì§€ ì•Šì€ ë°°ì—´(card_deck) ëœë¤í•˜ê²Œ 3ë²ˆ ì„ëŠ”ë‹¤. forë¬¸ìœ¼ë¡œ ë²”ìœ„ë¥¼ 3ìœ¼ë¡œ ì •í•´ 3ë²ˆë™ì•ˆ shuffle()ì„ ì´ìš©í•´ ì„ì–´ì¤€ë‹¤.

  3. ì‚¬ìš©ìê°€ í•œë²ˆì˜ ì…”í”Œì„ ì •í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆìœ¼ë¯€ë¡œ y/nìœ¼ë¡œ ì…ë ¥ê°’ì„ ë°›ì•„ yì¸ ê²½ìš° shuffle()ì´ìš©í•´ í•œë²ˆ ë” ì„ì–´ì¤€ë‹¤.

    ì´ë•Œ ì‚¬ìš©ìì˜ ê°’ì—ì„œ ì²«ë²ˆì§¸ ìˆ«ìê°€ 11ì¸ ê²½ìš° , 2ê°œì˜ í•©ì´ 21ì„ ë„˜ëŠ”ê²½ìš° 11ì„ ->1 ë¡œ ë³€ê²½í•œë‹¤. ifë¬¸ì„ ì´ìš©í•´ user_card[0]ì— 11ì¸ì§€ ì•„ë‹Œì§€ë¥¼ ë¨¼ì € íŒë‹¨í•œ í›„ ë§ì„ê²½ìš° user_card[0]=1ë¡œ ë°”ê¾¸ì–´ì¤€ë‹¤.

  8. ë”œëŸ¬ì˜ ì¹´ë“œ í•©ê³„ 16ì„ ë„˜ê²Œë˜ë©´ ìœ ì €ì˜ ì¹´ë“œê°’ê³¼ ë¹„êµí•œë‹¤. ì´ë¯¸ ì•ì—ì„œ ìœ ì €ì˜ ì¹´ë“œê°’ì´ 21ì„ ì´ˆê³¼í•˜ì˜€ê¸°ë•Œë¬¸ì— ë”œëŸ¬ì˜ ì¹´ë“œí•©ê³„ê°€ 21ì„ ì´ˆê³¼í•´ì•¼ì§€ë§Œ ë¬´ìŠ¹ë¶€ê°€ ëœë‹¤. ë§Œì•½ 21ì„ ì´ˆê³¼í•˜ì§€ ì•Šìœ¼ë©´ ë”œëŸ¬ê°€ ìš°ìŠ¹ìê°€ ëœë‹¤.

  9. ë§Œì•½ ìœ ì €ê°€ ë©ˆì¶”ëŠ” ê²ƒì„ ì„ íƒí•œë‹¤ë©´ ë”œëŸ¬ì˜ í„´ìœ¼ë¡œ ë°”ë¡œ ë„˜ì–´ê°€ê²Œ ëœë‹¤. ë”œëŸ¬ëŠ” 7ë²ˆì„ ë°˜ë³µí•˜ê³  ë”œëŸ¬ì˜ ì¹´ë“œí•©ì´ 16ì„ ë„˜ê¸°ê²Œ ë˜ë©´ ìœ ì €ì˜ ì¹´ë“œí•©ê³„ì™€ ë”œëŸ¬ì˜ ì¹´ë“œí•©ê³„ë¥¼ ë¹„êµí•˜ì—¬ 21ì— ê°€ì¥ ê°€ê¹Œìš´ ì‚¬ëŒì´ ìŠ¹ë¦¬í•˜ê²Œ ëœë‹¤.

  10. card_deckì´ ê°ì†Œí• ë•Œë§ˆë‹¤ ì¹´ë“œë± ìˆ˜ë¥¼ ì¹´ìš´íŠ¸í•˜ì—¬ 10ë³´ë‹¤ ì‘ì•„ì§€ëŠ”ê²½ìš° ì…”í”Œì ˆì°¨ë¥¼ ìˆ˜í–‰í•œë‹¤. card_deckë¥¼ len()ì„ ì´ìš©í•˜ì—¬ ê¸¸ì´ë¥¼ ì¹´ìš´íŠ¸í•˜ì—¬ í•´ë‹¹ ê¸¸ì´ê°€ 10ë³´ë‹¤ ì‘ì€ê²½ìš° 1~2ë²ˆì„ ìˆ˜í–‰í•œë‹¤.

import random


def init():  # 40ê°œì˜ 3ë²ˆ ì…”í”Œí•œ ëœë¤í•œ ì¹´ë“œë± ìƒì„±í•˜ê¸°
    card_deck = [i for i in range(2,11+1) for _ in range(4)]
    for _ in range(3):
        random.shuffle(card_deck)
    print('*'*25,'BLACK JACK GAME START','*'*25,
          '\n\nCard Deck Shuffling..\n')
    return card_deck 


def user_choose_shuffle(card_deck): # ì‚¬ìš©ìê°€ ì›í•  ê²½ìš° í•œë²ˆë” ì…”í”Œ
        card_shuffle = input('Complete card deck shuffle ! [one more? : y/n]:')
        if card_shuffle =='y':
            print('\n--- Card Deck Shuffle ---')
            random.shuffle(card_deck)
        return card_deck    
            
        
def game_start(): #ê²Œì„ ì‹œì‘. ë”œëŸ¬ì™€ ì‚¬ìš©ì ì˜¤í”ˆí•˜ëŠ” ì¹´ë“œ 1ì¥ì”© ë¶€ì—¬
    user_card = []
    dealar_card = []
    first_player_card = random.choice(card_deck)
    first_dealar_card = random.choice(card_deck)
    card_deck.remove(first_player_card)
    card_deck.remove(first_dealar_card)             
    user_card.append(first_player_card)
    dealar_card.append(first_dealar_card)
    print('\n','*'*30,'FIRST TURN','*'*30,'\n')    
    print(f'USER Card : {user_card}\n')
    print(f'DEALAR Card : {dealar_card}\n')
    return user_card, dealar_card


def first_user_turn(user_card,card_deck): # ì‚¬ìš©ì ë¨¼ì € ê²Œì„ ì‹œì‘, ë±ì—ì„œ ëœë¤í•œ ìˆ«ì í•˜ë‚˜ ì „ë‹¬
    user_pop_card = random.choice(card_deck)
    user_card.append(user_pop_card)
    card_deck.remove(user_pop_card)
    
    if user_card[0] == 11:  # ì²˜ìŒê°’ 11, í•©ê³„ 20ì´ˆê³¼ì‹œ 11->1ë¡œ ë³€ê²½
        if sum(user_card) > 20:
            user_card[0]=1
            
    if sum(user_card) == 21:  
        print('ğŸŒŸBLACKJACKğŸŒŸ USER WIN !')
        return
    
    print('\n','*'*28,'FIRST USER TURN','*'*28,'\n')
    print('Receive a one Card..\n')
    print(f'USER Card : {user_card}\n')
    return user_card, card_deck


def user_turn(user_card,card_deck): # ì‚¬ìš©ì turn
    user_pop_card = random.choice(card_deck)
    user_card.append(user_pop_card)
    card_deck.remove(user_pop_card)
    card_deck = remain_card(card_deck)
    print('*'*32,'USER TURN','*'*32,'\n')
    print('Receive a one Card..\n')
    print(f'User_Card : {user_card}')
    return user_card,card_deck 

    
    
def dealar_turn(dealar_card, card_deck): # ë”œëŸ¬ turn
    if dealar_card[0] == 11:  # ì²˜ìŒê°’ 11, í•©ê³„ 20ì´ˆê³¼ì‹œ 11->1ë¡œ ë³€ê²½
        if sum(dealar_card) > 20:
            dealar_card[0]=1
            
    while sum(dealar_card) < 17 :
        print(f'Dealar Receiving a Card..\n')
        dealar_pop_card = random.choice(card_deck)
        dealar_card.append(dealar_pop_card)
        card_deck.remove(dealar_pop_card)
        card_deck = remain_card(card_deck)
    print(f'Total Dealar Card : {sum(dealar_card)}\n')
    
    return dealar_card, card_deck


def ask_user(dealar_card,user_card, card_deck): # ask hit or stay 
    while True:
        print('\n','*'*29,'HIT ? ASK USER','*'*29,'\n')
        answer = input('One more card? [y/n] :')
        if answer == 'n':
            print('\n--- STAY ---')
            print('*'*31,'DEALAR TURN','*'*31,'\n') 
            dealar_card, card_deck = dealar_turn(dealar_card, card_deck)
            print(f'>>>>>TOTAL USER CARD SUM : {sum(user_card)}')
            print(f'>>>>>TOTAL DEALAR CARD SUM {sum(dealar_card)}\n')            
            diff_card_sum(dealar_card, user_card)
            break
            
        elif answer == 'y':
            print('\n--- hit ---')
            user_card, card_deck = user_turn(user_card, card_deck)
            if sum(user_card) > 20:
                print('\n--- Total card exceeds 21 ---\n')
                print('*'*31,'DEALAR TURN','*'*31,'\n') 
                dealar_card, card_deck = dealar_turn(dealar_card, card_deck)
                if sum(dealar_card) > 20:
                    print('DEAD HEAT â—')  
                else:
                    print('ğŸ¤£DEALAR WINğŸ¤£')
                break
                

def diff_card_sum(dealar_card, user_card): # ìœ ì €ì™€ ë”œëŸ¬ ì¹´ë“œí•©ê³„ diff
#     print(f'ìœ ì € ì¹´ë“œ í•©ê³„{sum(user_card)}')
#     print(f'ë”œëŸ¬ ì¹´ë“œ í•©ê³„{sum(dealar_card)}')
    if sum(dealar_card) > 20:
        print('ğŸŒŸUSER WINğŸŒŸ')
    else:
        if sum(dealar_card) > sum(user_card):
            print('ğŸ¤£DEALAR WINğŸ¤£')
        else:
            print('ğŸŒŸUSER WINğŸŒŸ')

            
def remain_card(card_num):  # ì¹´ë“œë± ìˆ˜ 10ì¥ ì•„ë˜ì¼ ê²½ìš° ì¹´ë“œë± ì…”í”Œì ˆì°¨ ìˆ˜í–‰
    if len(card_num) < 10 :
        print(f'ë‚¨ì€ Card Deck ìˆ˜ : {card_num}, 10ì¥ ì´í•˜.. ì¹´ë“œ shuffle í•„ìš”')
        card_num = init()
        print(f'ì¹´ë“œ shuffle ì™„ë£Œ {len(card_num)}')
    return card_num


ğŸ‘‰ ì½”ë“œ ê²°ê³¼ ì¶œë ¥

card_deck = init()
card_deck = user_choose_shuffle(card_deck)
user_card, dealar_card = game_start()
user_card, card_deck = first_user_turn(user_card, card_deck)
ask_user(dealar_card,user_card, card_deck)

ğŸ‘‰ Abstract Classes


[Task]


[Sample Input]

The Alchemist
Paulo Coelho
248


[Sample Output]

Title: The Alchemist
Author: Paulo Coelho
Price: 248


[Code]

from abc import ABCMeta, abstractmethod


class Book(object, metaclass=ABCMeta):
    def __init__(self,title,author):
        self.title=title
        self.author=author   
    @abstractmethod
    def display(): pass

#Write MyBook class
class MyBook(Book):
    def __init__(self,title,author,price):
        super(MyBook,self).__init__(title,author)
        self.price =price
    def display(self):
        print(f'Title: {self.title}')
        print(f'Author: {self.author}')
        print(f'Price: {self.price}')

title=input()
author=input()
price=int(input())
new_novel=MyBook(title,author,price)
new_novel.display()

[Task]

2ê°œì˜ Person, Student classê°€ ì£¼ì–´ì§„ë‹¤. ì´ë•Œ Personì€ base class(ë¶€ëª¨ class)ì´ê³  StudentëŠ” derived class(íŒŒìƒ,ìì‹ class)ì´ë‹¤. Student classëŠ” Person classì˜ ëª¨ë“  ì†ì„±ì„ ìƒì†ë°›ìœ¼ë©° StudentëŠ” 4ê°œì˜ íŒŒë¼ë¯¸í„°ë¥¼ ë°›ëŠ”ë‹¤.
1.A string, firstName
2.A string, lastName
3.A Integer, idNumber
4.An Integer array of test scores

Grading Scaleì€ Student ê°ì²´ì˜ í‰ê· ì„ ê³„ì‚°í•˜ê³  ê³„ì‚°ëœ í‰ê· ì„ ë‚˜íƒ€ë‚´ëŠ” í•™ë…„, ë¬¸ìë¥¼ ë°˜í™˜í•˜ëŠ” calculate ë©”ì„œë“œì´ë‹¤


[Input Format]


[Constraints]


[Output Format]


[Sample Input]

Heraldo Memelli 8135627
2
100 80


[Sample Output]

 Name: Memelli, Heraldo
 ID: 8135627
 Grade: O


[Explanation]


[Code]

class Student(Person):
    #   Class Constructor
    #   
    #   Parameters:
    #   firstName - A string denoting the Person's first name.
    #   lastName - A string denoting the Person's last name.
    #   id - An integer denoting the Person's ID number.
    #   scores - An array of integers denoting the Person's test scores.
    #
    # Write your constructor here
    def __init__(self,firstName, lastName, idNumber, scores):
        super(Student,self).__init__(firstName,lastName,idNumber)
        self.scores = scores

    #   Function Name: calculate
    #   Return: A character denoting the grade.
    #
    # Write your function here
    def calculate(self):
        avg = sum(scores)/len(scores)   # scoresê°€ listí˜•ì‹ì´ë¯€ë¡œ sumê³¼ lenì„ ì´ìš©í•´ì„œ í‰ê· ì„ êµ¬í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤
        
        if avg >=90 and avg <= 100:
            return('O')
        elif avg >= 80 and avg <90:
            return('E')
        elif avg >= 70 and avg <80:
            return('A')
        elif avg >=55 and avg<70:
            return('P')
        elif avg >= 40 and avg<55:
            return('D')
        elif avg < 40:
            return('T')

ì˜ˆë¥¼ ë“¤ë©´ SmartPhone ì´ë¼ëŠ” classê°€ ìˆê³  í•´ë‹¹ í´ë˜ìŠ¤ë¥¼ ìƒì†ë°›ì€ iphone, galaxy í´ë˜ìŠ¤ë¥¼ ë§Œë“¤ ìˆ˜ ìˆìœ¼ë©°, SmartPhone classì— ë©”ì„œë“œë¥¼ ë§Œë“¤ë©´ iphone, galaxy í´ë˜ìŠ¤ì—ì„œ SmartPhone classì— ìˆëŠ” ì†ì„±ê³¼ ë©”ì„œë“œë¥¼ ì‚¬ìš©í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤.

class SmartPhone:

Galaxy classëŠ” super()ì„ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ì—¬ ìƒì†ë°›ì•˜ë‹¤.

ìì‹ í´ë˜ìŠ¤ì—ì„œëŠ” ap,osì˜ ì†ì„±ê³¼ open_aiì˜ ë©”ì„œë“œë¥¼ ëª¨ë‘ ì‚¬ìš©í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆìŒì„ í™•ì¸í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤

class Computer:
    def __init__(self,cpu,ram):
        self.CPU = cpu
        self.RAM = ram
    
    def browse(self):
        print('browse')
    
    def work(self):
        print('work')

class Laptop(Computer):
    
    def __init__(self,cpu,ram,battery):
        super().__init__(cpu,ram)
        self.battery = battery
    
    def move(self, to):
        print(f'move to {to}')

lap = Laptop('intel',16,'powerful')
lap.browse()
lap.work()
lap.move('office')

ê²½ì°°ê´€ê³¼ ì´ì˜ ê´€ê³„ë¥¼ ë³´ë©´ ê²½ì°°ì€ ì´ì„ ê°€ì§€ê³  ìˆê¸° ë•Œë¬¸ì— HAS-Aì˜ ê´€ê³„ì´ë‹¤. ê²½ì°°ì€ ì´ì„ ê°€ì§€ê³  ìˆì„ìˆ˜ë„ ìˆê³  ê°€ì§€ê³  ìˆì§€ ì•Šì„ ìˆ˜ë„ ìˆë‹¤. ê²½ì°°ì€ ì´ì„ ì–¸ì œë“ ì§€ ë°˜ë‚©í•  ìˆ˜ ë„ ìˆë‹¤. ê²½ì°°ì´ ì¡´ì¬í•´ë„ ì´ì´ ì—†ì„ìˆ˜ë„ ìˆê³  ìˆì„ìˆ˜ë„ ìˆëŠ”ê²ƒì²˜ëŸ¼ ë‘˜ì˜ ê°ì²´ëŠ” ìƒëª…ì£¼ê¸°ë¥¼ í•¨ê»˜ í•˜ì§€ ì•ŠëŠ” ìƒëŒ€ì ìœ¼ë¡œ ì•½í•œ ê´€ê³„ì´ë‹¤. ì´ëŸ¬í•œ ê´€ê³„ë¥¼ __Aggregation__ì´ë¼ê³  í•œë‹¤

ì•„ë˜ì˜ ì½”ë“œë¥¼ ë³´ë©´ Police ê°ì²´ê°€ ë§Œë“¤ì–´ì§ˆë•Œ ì•„ì§ Gun ê°ì²´ë¥¼ ê°€ì§€ê³  ìˆì§€ ì•ŠëŠ”ë‹¤. ì´í›„ acquire_gun() ë©”ì„œë“œë¥¼ í†µí•´ Gun ê°ì²´ë¥¼ ì¸ìŠ¤í„´ìŠ¤ ë³€ìˆ˜ë¡œ ê°€ì§€ê²Œ ëœë‹¤. ì´ëŠ” HAS-A ê´€ê³„ì´ë‹¤. ë˜í•œ release_gun() ë©”ì„œë“œë¥¼ í†µí•´ ê°€ì§€ê³  ìˆë˜ ì´ì„ ë°˜ë‚©í•  ìˆ˜ë„ ìˆë‹¤. ì´ ë‘ë©”ì„œë“œë¥¼ ì´ìš©í•˜ë©´ ì´ì„ ê°€ì§„ ê²½ì°°ê³¼ ê°€ì§€ê³  ìˆì§€ ì•Šì€ ê²½ì°°ì„ ëª¨ë‘ í‘œí˜„í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤

class Gun:
    def __init__(self,kind):
        self.kind = kind
        
    def bang(self):
        print('bang bang')
        
class Police:
    def __init__(self):
        self.gun = None
        
    def acquire_gun(self, gun): # ì´ì–»ëŠ”ë‹¤
        self.gun = gun
        
    def release_gun(self):  # ì´ ë°˜ë‚©í•œë‹¤
        gun = self.gun
        self.gun = None
        return gun
    
    def shoot(self):  # ì´ ìœë‹¤
        if self.gun:
            self.gun.bang()
        else:
            print('Unable to shoot')
